src:
Pesan Jokowi ke Menhan Prabowo: Tekan Impor, Genjot Industri Lokal
01 Nov 2019, 01:00 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) meminta Kementerian Pertahanan (Kemenhan) mendorong industrialisasi di sektor pertahanan. Hal itu ditujukan agar Indonesia tidak melulu bergantung impor.Jokowi juga menyinggung mengenai hambatan dalam pembangunan kilang minyak (refinery). Menurutnya jangan sampai ada mafia yang membajak aparat hukum untuk mengganggu proses pembangunan.Dirinya menyampaikan hal di atas saat membuka rapat terbatas (ratas) mengenai penyampaian program dan kegiatan di bidang politik, hukum, dan keamanan di Kantor Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019).Seperti apa instruksi Presiden ke Prabowo? Baca di halaman selanjutnya. (toy/eds)
text:
Jokowi's Message to Defense Minister Prabowo: Press Imports, Boost Local Industries
Nov 01 2019, 01:00 by Trio Hamdani


Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) asked the Ministry of Defense (Kemenhan) to encourage industrialization in the defense sector. This is intended so that Indonesia does not merely depend on imports. Jokowi also mentioned the obstacles in the construction of refineries. According to him, there must be no mafia who hijacked the law enforcement agencies to disrupt the development process. He conveyed the above when opening a limited meeting (ratas) regarding the delivery of programs and activities in the political, legal and security fields at the Presidential Office, Jakarta, Thursday (10/31) /2019).What are the President's instructions like to Prabowo? Read on the next page. (toy / eds)
